001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format;
002
003import java.time.ZoneId;
004
005import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
006
007import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
008import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder;
009import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
010import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProvider;
011import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProviderRef;
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.ServiceRegistry;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.ConvertParameter;
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.KeyParameter;
016import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.PassThroughParameter;
017import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
018import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator;
019import io.jstach.svc.ServiceProvider;
020
021/**
022 * Configures Logback style pattern encoders and offers provision with the URI scheme
023 * {@value PatternEncoder#PATTERN_SCHEME}.
024 */
025@ServiceProvider(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class)
026public final class PatternConfigurator implements Configurator {
027
028        /**
029         * For service loader to call.
030         */
031        public PatternConfigurator() {
032                // for service loader.
033        }
034
035        @Override
036        public boolean configure(LogConfig config, Pass pass) {
037                var services = config.serviceRegistry();
038                String n = ServiceRegistry.DEFAULT_SERVICE_NAME;
039                services.putIfAbsent(PatternRegistry.class, n, PatternRegistry::of);
040                services.putIfAbsent(PatternCompiler.class, n, () -> PatternCompiler.of(b -> {
041                }).provide(n, config));
042                config.encoderRegistry().register(PatternEncoder.PATTERN_SCHEME, new PatternEncoderProvider());
043                return true;
044        }
045
046        @LogConfigurable(name = "PatternEncoderBuilder", prefix = LogProperties.ENCODER_PREFIX)
047        static LogProvider<LogEncoder> provideEncoder(@KeyParameter String name, String pattern,
048                        @PassThroughParameter @Nullable PatternCompiler patternCompiler) {
049                return (n, config) -> {
050                        var compiler = patternCompiler;
051                        if (compiler == null) {
052                                compiler = PatternCompiler.of(b -> {
053                                }).provide(name, config);
054                        }
055                        return LogEncoder.of(compiler.compile(pattern));
056                };
057        }
058
059        @LogConfigurable(name = "PatternConfigBuilder", prefix = PatternConfig.PATTERN_CONFIG_PREFIX)
060        static PatternConfig provideFormatterConfig(@KeyParameter String name,
061                        @ConvertParameter("convertZoneId") @Nullable ZoneId zoneId, @Nullable String lineSeparator,
062                        @Nullable Boolean ansiDisabled) {
063                PatternConfig dc = PatternConfig.of();
064                ansiDisabled = ansiDisabled == null ? dc.ansiDisabled() : ansiDisabled;
065                lineSeparator = lineSeparator == null ? dc.lineSeparator() : lineSeparator;
066                return new SimpleFormatterConfig(zoneId, lineSeparator, ansiDisabled);
067
068        }
069
070        static ZoneId convertZoneId(@Nullable String zoneId) {
071                var dc = PatternConfig.of();
072                ZoneId zoneId_ = zoneId == null ? dc.zoneId() : ZoneId.of(zoneId);
073                return zoneId_;
074        }
075
076}
077
078record PatternEncoderProvider() implements LogEncoder.EncoderProvider {
079
080        @Override
081        public LogProvider<LogEncoder> provide(LogProviderRef ref) {
082                return (name, config) -> {
083                        PatternEncoderBuilder b = new PatternEncoderBuilder(name);
084                        b.fromProperties(config.properties(), ref);
085                        return b.build().provide(name, config);
086                };
087        }
088
089}
